website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking an inexpensive  silicone bottle will find their match in this efficient pair.
pros: High-quality silicone resistant to   odors and strange tastes
Comes in a set of two with attached carabiners
A portion of the bottles' profits are donated to charity
cons: Water has a chemical taste during the first few uses

customer_reviews.title: It grows mold inside bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I first got this bottles but after two month it grew mold inside the bottle. I washed it manually and also put it in the dishwasher but it didn’t go away. Very sad because I love that it was soft.
customer_reviews.author: ECA

customer_reviews.title: Used it before reviewing.
customer_reviews.text: My concerns were all alleviated when I used this. My desire was to have something super light and small that I could take through TSA and fill on the other side. Very easy to fill. You have to shift is a bit if you want it to stand on its own, but it does stand. I clipped it to something to keep it stable. It stayed closed when put in the pocket of the seat in front of me on the plane. After the flight I emptied the bottle, turned it up side down to dry and then collapsed for my next use.
customer_reviews.author: JanBo

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Washed and dried bottles per instructions. At first water tasted ok, but after a couple hours water smelled and tasted like plastic. Bought these for traveling, and although the bottle part collapses/rolls up fairly small, the large hard plastic top and spout make it too large to be a real space saver. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. L.

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather go thirsty than use these bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I give up! I've had two bottles for 4 months now and simply can't get rid of the horrible taste that the silicone imparts into the water. I've washed them, soaked them , let air dry to no avail. Every time I fill them I take one sip and get grossed out! My husband agrees. He doesn't like the taste of the water in them and says no thanks if I offer him one. I don't feel safe drinking out of anything that makes my water taste bad. I definitely wouldn't recommend giving them to children, they don't know any better and could be being harmed by the chemicals leaching into the water.
customer_reviews.author: bkaldy

customer_reviews.title: I love these water bottles!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these water bottles for my hiking trip in Switzerland. They definitely did not disappoint! I love that I can tightly roll them up and throw it in my suitcase or clip it on my backpack. I use it every time I travel now, since TSA makes you throw out all liquids over a few ounces. Only downfall I’ve come across is that the bottle can be a little hard to drink with using only one hand, and I had to use two for support. Other than that, it’s great! I highly recommend for anyone who travels a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Survived 7 European countries in 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our 3 weeks in Europe (visited 7 countries) and couldn't be happier! We traveled every 2-3 days via plane or train and never had a single problem or damage to the bottle or tab that helps it stay rolled up. The only flaw is the cheap caribeaner that will break easily if pulled on too much. Additionally, we carried these daily to our tours, sight seeing, etc. They were perfect for that because when the bottle was empty, you folded it up until you could refill it and it was out of the way! We honestly could not have been happier with these bottles!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany G.

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle, clip broke within 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. This bottle deserves 5 stars, but the clip attached broke after 5 days, so I reduced the rating to 4. I attached this bottle to my backpack at Disney World and just let it hang. Because it was soft, I couldn’t even tell it was there. It didn’t interfere when walking around or sitting. My new favorite water bottle, just need to now buy a replacement clip somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works but carabiner broke
customer_reviews.text: We used both bottles for an international travel. It is light, collapsible, easy to refill and leak proof. It achieved its purpose. It was just tricky to drink from it when it is not full as the bottle is soft. It is also easy to wash and did not leave a plastic taste in the water. My only issue is the carabiner it came with. Both clips broke the moment we used it to clip on our backpacks rendering it unclippable. It is not easily replaced as it is a smaller size than a regular carabiner. I tried to contact the seller to see if I can get replacement carabiners but I did not get any reply.
customer_reviews.author: RNSandee

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to drink out of
customer_reviews.text: I initially was looking for a lightweight water bottle because I carry so many for my kids, that I didn't want to add too much weight to my diaper bag. I loved the idea of it at first, but once I started to use it I realized that if was so flimsy that it was hard to drink out of and even hold. In order to drink it, you almost need to fold it like a tube of toothpaste. Wasn't a huge fan since I'm after convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Newby

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but terrible tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the water bottles are collapsible and great for traveling. My issue is how the water tastes, especially after a while in the bottle. After just filling it, the water has a faint taste of plastic that is tolerable - however after sitting in the bottle for hours the water is completely terrible tasting and I had to dump it out frequently. I tried cleaning it and rinsing it many times with soap but the taste prevailed.
customer_reviews.author: P. I. SIRIUS BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable, and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best travel bottle ever! This has now been to Washington DC , New Orleans , Aruba, Miami, Paris, and now Spain without even a hint of a problem...always attached to my pack so it bounces around a lot with no worries! Aaaand it rolls up into a very small footprint in my pack (I travel with only a backpack and every centimeter counts). Very lightweight as well Just an odd one too...all through the Paris museum they made people toss there water bottles before going in, but they never questioned the Baiji bottle :) The only downside I would say is you need to clean it a lot initially to get any ‘rubbery’ taste out of it .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 2 week backpacking trip in Europe. My husband and I hate having to buy bottled water when the tap water is perfectly fine to drink where we were traveling. I was a little nervous about the bottles leaking or the plastic parts or clips breaking, but these bottles were pretty indestructible. We clipped them onto our bags, threw them into our day packs, rolled them up, unrolled them, rolled them up again, filled them up countless times, and never had a single leak! I loved that they rolled up so easily for going through airport security. I am completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it, stands up well even when empty, and does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other similar collapsible bottles and so far this one is perfect. I've used both bottles every day since receiving them (about 2-3 weeks ago). The big test was the leak test, I've had them upside down, on their side, and filled to different levels and no leaking! Love the size of the opening, the others I've tried are quite big and take away from the purpose, to roll down into a small size for packing and traveling. These stand up very solid with or without liquid. Intended for travel, but have replaced my every day water bottle. Would definitely recommend and will buy more in the future--probably as good gift for friends who love to travel and hike.
customer_reviews.author: Liisa

customer_reviews.title: taste like rubber
customer_reviews.text: awful threw both of them in the garbage-no matter how many times i washed them (according to instructions) the water still tasted like the rubber or whatever it was made out of. absolute waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Darcy R. Suwinski

customer_reviews.title: I really tried to like these
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this and I tried using them several times. The silicone/plastic taste did not leave the bottles after multiple, multiple washings. And it just gets worse as the bottles get warm. Also, once the water bottles are about half full, they flop over to the side when you go to squeeze them. You have to hold at top and bottom to have a direct shot into your mouth. I tried to use them so many times because we really wanted to use them at summer camp. I wish I would have just returned after the first try.
customer_reviews.author: J Demarest

customer_reviews.title: bought these for my dad
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these bottles from a local store, and my dad really liked it. I used it to put in my pants pocket while snowboarding because it absorbed the shock without busting or leaking. I never had an issue with the one i bought. however, these leak. a lot. we aren't sure how, if there is a hole, if it leaks from the nozzle closure, or from where the lid screws on but it leaked all over his backpack while skiing, which lead to him being cold all day and forming icicles all down his back and butt. both of the bottles i got were defective. kinda dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small-sized collapsible water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Collapsible water bottle is the perfect size for a walk in the park or walking the dog. It is easy to fill and to hold, the carabiner makes it easy to clip or hold on to. So far no leaks. It holds its shape well, both when full and empty. Being transparent, it is easy to see how much water is in the bottle. It is not insulated so condensation does appear outside if you use chilled water or ice, so consider this if packing a filled bottle. I rinsed the bottle out with lemon after first receiving it and never detected a plastic taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a replacement and a hand written card. It made me chuckle, thanks. I attached the photo to this review. Bottles: An undocumented feature to these bottles is you can squeeze a full one to squirt a little. Other kids and counselors at my children’s summer camp thought the bottles were really cool. The bottles can be rolled up and shoved in a cargo pocket or clipped onto a belt/bag. No clanging sounds and minimal space :)
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerX

customer_reviews.title: Very upset about this product
customer_reviews.text: This product was highly recommended to me for traveling. Since I was spending 2 1/2 weeks in Italy, I thought it would be perfect. How disappointing! The clips broke before I even got to Italy. When filled with water, it was hard to drink out of and very flimsy. Not sure if I could get a refund but I definitely would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean and drink from
customer_reviews.text: While I love the fact that these bottles are collapsible, they are incredibly difficult to clean and seem to get moldy even with proper cleaning. They seem to always smell and taste like dish detergent. They are also a challenge to balance on a table and drink out of since they are such thin material. I really wanted to like these since I think this is a fantastic idea, they just need a little more work to perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Miss30

customer_reviews.title: Handy but a little awkward
customer_reviews.text: I've used these water bottles traveling both nationally and internationally. They are very convenient size-wise, but I have had issues cleaning the mouthpieces. There's a seam within the cap that is hard to clean and I've noticed some mold building up there, after only using the bottle for a few days. As long as you have some sort of scrubby brush (one used to clean reusable straws would be perfect) it shouldn't be much of a problem. They're also pretty floppy if they aren't filled up all the way, which can make drinking out of them just a little bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because they were packable and inexpensive. We were pleasantly surprised with the quality. We used them daily for 3 months of backpacking through Europe. We didn't have an issue with any smells after they were washed. My only annoyance was that silicone literally picks up so much dirt and dust so I had to be constantly wiping it off. At the end of our trip they were still going strong. We will use them for our next backpacking or camping trip. No issues with leakage. They roll up quite small and are very light.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. P.

customer_reviews.title: MAKES WATER TASTE TOXIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take with us on a 3+ week trip out of the country, and the first couple days they were fine. Then one day, I took a sip shortly after refilling it and the taste was SO bad, we couldn’t drink it! I tried cleaning them thoroughly, but the bad taste won’t go away. I want to return them, but since the return deadline passed before we got back home, I cannot return them. Needless to say, I am not happy with this situation, and I will not recommend these water bottles to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice but excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered other brand which was better for the following reasons: 1)The silicon was thicker 2)The bottle didn't leak when turned upside down. This bottle doesn't have the filter that let the liquid out only when we drink and this is prone to accident of soggy bags. 3)It was easier to put the retainer band on and the retainer band was also stronger. I don't think that this band will hole much longer. The pro: Excellent customer service!!! Without even asking I got a personal email from the co-founder and he asked me about the product. I replied by listing all the short coming and his reply was extremely professional. I will certainly look into future products by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Shrager

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight and versitile option for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I took this bottle out today for a test run hiking with it attached to my backpack and then carrying it at the beach. I rinsed and washed before use and there was no smell or taste lingering. The bottle worked beautifully for what I want! I'm backpacking this summer and needed something g lightweight that I can attach to my pack. It was easy to access and held up perfectly. I'm testing out freezing it tonight to see how it can double as an ice pack on my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy for our trip to Europe. They are collapsible so when empty they roll up and tie up to the size of a post it note, and when filled up are a regular size water bottle. In Europe there are water fountains everywhere, so it was great to throw these in my bag and fill them up as we walked around. We had many people stop us and ask about them when they saw us unroll them and fill them up. Rinse them out a few times the first time you get them, because they will have a plastic-ey flavor the first few times, but then it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Leyla

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, affordable, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I live in the Rocky Mountains,& spend most of my time outside. These are perfect for rolling up when you’re done using them. I mainly bought these for Hawaii when I travel the islands. I wanted something that didn’t take up tons of space. I haven’t experienced a ‘bad taste’ . (I’m wondering if others are letting the water sit in it for extended periods of time ?) Anyhow, I do plan to purchase some for my kids as well. Glad a portion of every purchase goes towards a good cause.
customer_reviews.author: KMV

customer_reviews.title: Used on our sightseeing trip in Italy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these bottles to carry easily in a bag as we toured Rome. There are fountains all around where you can refill a water bottle and avoid buying bottled water. We all agreed that these bottles were one of the best purchases we made for our trip. For those who say that the bottles grow mold, if you wash them regularly and let them air dry, and don't close them up while there's still moisture inside, they aren't going to mold. We didn't notice any offensive smell at all. These were economical for a pack of two, and plus they help dolphins!
customer_reviews.author: georgiamom

customer_reviews.title: Took it to Florida for a week, was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous after reading reviews, but this worked perfect for a week in Florida. Easy to pack and fill. Other people purchased insulated water bottles, but were not able to fill them up at the drinking fountain. I would fill them up drinking fountain or water station, then hang them on my backpack, I think my kids drank more because they were not your typically water bottle. Washing them is easy, they are ready for our next vacation :-).
customer_reviews.author: Aprille_01

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Easy to Bring Along
customer_reviews.text: Collapsible bottles like this are a tradeoff, convenience over ease of use. You do have to support the bottle while drinking from it, but if it were rigid it wouldn't roll up out of the way. I took one on a recent trip and had no leaks. I have never gotten a plasticky or off flavor or odor from it, and I am very sensitive to those things. In a perfect world it would keep your water cold and be easier to drink from, but it does contain water well, which meets my basic need for it.
customer_reviews.author: cynthus

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a GREAT Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to the Baiji Bottles a couple of years ago on an eductional trip with my students and I feel in love! I’ve tried cheaper ones and they do not compare at all to the quality of these. I recommend them to all my students when we travel and had to pick up some for myself! These are hands down the best collapsible silicone water bottles! The quality is amazing and they hold up so well and traveled all through Paris, Barcelona, and Madrid! And such a great price! Don’t waste your $1 on cheap ones! You won’t be sorry to purchase these! Looking forward to traveling with them! Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far they are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for travel. You can not take liquids through security. If you have a long wait before your flight and don't want to buy an expensive coffee... this is for you. Also, while on the plane sometimes for many reasons it is difficult to get water, you will not be miserable waiting. One discount airline did not give water, starts with a W. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: LaurelOlivia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold, affordable, flexible bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are great for travel. You should expect that these aren't great for setting on the table, but I have tested them ahead of my backpacking trip to Italy and they serve their intended purpose. They won't take up much room unfilled and they are easy to unroll, fill, and drink out of. Wash them a few times when you get them to reduce the silicon smell/taste. Make sure the lid is screwed on and close once they are filled in order to carry them around.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: So I love how these fold up small, and they are great for traveling through the airport and not wanting to pay full price for water (fill up at the fountain), but besides that...they are just ok. The bottle is soft, so as you drink it’s harder to grip and hold onto. I have to almost blow air back into the bottle to get it to stand up, and the squeeze the water out when I’m thirsty. Not a terrible product, not my favorite. Might be good to keep on hand, but I don’t expect I will use if for more than having a backup in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: First collapsible water bottle and I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first collapsible water bottle and it took some time getting used to it- I couldn't figure out how to drink from it but once I got my bearings around a non-solid water bottle, I really enjoyed it. And when I was done with it, I could simply roll it up, and toss it in my bag and it takes up almost no space. Best of all it comes with a carabiner clip for hands-free transportation I love the feel of the water bottle, feels like light-weigh silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Zarate

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: meh.. I like that when I go out with this, when I finish, I can roll it up so it saves space and isn't heavy.. it freezes well. ..BUT... I put diluted coconut water ONE TIME and it now forever tastes and smells like coconuts. Did I mention I do not like the smell or taste of coconut water because I overused it... womp womp. And it's starting to have that plastic taste too. So, there's that..
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for travelers!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this type of water bottle about 2yrs ago. They are the BEST. Imagine having the ability to drink your water, fold the bottle, and put it in your pocket/bag/belt. I bought the blue and pink bottles for my partner and I and so far after 6 International trips, 3 Camping Trips, and taking it basically everywhere they are still good! No leaks! Just be careful not to overfill them. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMN

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, a little getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I recently took these on a 2 week trip to Ireland and these were great for travel. They are a little floppy (they are silicone after all) and they can be a little awkward to drink out of when not full, but the packability was nice and the small size fit well in the backpack I was using. One thing I did notice in trying to air them out/clean them, they never really dry out completely and the opening is too small to clean them with ease. I had read another review that mentioned mold growing inside- I did not have this problem, but it is something I could see being a potential issue.
customer_reviews.author: TheLoverOfStory

customer_reviews.title: I stress less and drink more water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cruise and didn't use it. I decided I'm going to use it when I go workout. I took it to work and fell inlove. I drunk a lot more water now. It take some time to get used to the feel of it. But when you get past it it doubles as a stress reducer. I find myself squeezing it at work and when I do it reminds me to drink more water. Since I started using it I drink about 3x the amount of water than I used to! I highly recommend this water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from vacation in the Southwest where we did some hiking in the hot weather. These bottles worked well as they were easy to pack in our suitcase for the plane traveling. Easy to fill and put in our backpacks. We would fill them overnight so ready to go in the morning when we were headed out. Obviously they don't keep the water cold like an insulated bottle but we knew that when we bought them. The only reason I did not give a full 4 stars is the taste of plastic remains even after I cleaned several times with soapy water. However, that will not stop us from using them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Row Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great for theme parks!
customer_reviews.text: My BF and I have annual passes to Universal Studios Florida and we hate two things: 1) paying for water (which is usually 4 or 5 bucks) & 2) using the lockers to get on rides (those things are too crowded) These are a remedy for both! We fill them up at the water fountains and drink to our hearts content. Then we drain them while waiting in line, roll them up and get on the ride! Easy, no leaks and the silicone dries quickly. A must for us!
customer_reviews.author: Janice R Torres

customer_reviews.title: Freeze some milk
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to freeze extra milk in since I don't use enough milk for it not to go bad. With these I can pour milk in them and then freeze them. One thing to note is that the top part does not look like it could handle ice expansion. So be sure to not fill them all the way and have them upright when freezing. Update: The little screen in the nozzle gets plugged up with milk, but it can be popped out if you push downwards with something.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: What a Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed because I have to return this item. I followed the directions listed on Amazon's website to freeze it and allow it to thaw enough to drink the beverage (in this case it was water). When I opened the cap to drink, water gushed out all over my clothing and the bottle became so slippery and flimsy when wet, it almost fell out of my hand. I think it would be better if it weren't collapsible. Forget about it!
customer_reviews.author: Nightshade

customer_reviews.title: useful, but
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to France. I wanted something for the airplane, and to not have to buy water past security, as well as for walking around Paris. Pros: 1. Easy to fold up when not in use. 2. Easy to fill. 3. leakproof. cons: 1. hard to get the funky taste to go away. 2. a bit difficult to drink from. 3. almost impossible to dry once clean. It took a full week, upside down, to dry. I can understand why mold was a problem for some.
customer_reviews.author: review98

customer_reviews.title: decent for price
customer_reviews.text: These are more compact than some others when folded, and light weight. They are a bit on the flimsy side, though. While they will stand up on their own...they will also easily fall over, so you have to be careful. Good for travel, but for every day, I found it more convenient to cart around a silicon cup instead of bottle, since you can't store these too long after use without washing and drying them and they are not easy to towel dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson con Beans

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling...especially in Italy where water costs!!
customer_reviews.text: We took these on a cruise first. Great to have during shore excursions. Then we took them on a 2 week vacation through Italy. This was the best idea ever. We used them in the morning and at lunch time. Restaurants charge for water, so we only splurged at dinner time. Otherwise we just brought the bottles into the restaurant with us. It is normal there and in Venice, you can fill your bottle in many places. We had no issues with the taste of the water or cleaning the bottles. This was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I used these bottles on a trip to Africa. My grandchildren also used them and helped with this review. Very good quality, liked the ease of storage and we all found them to be of great quality. The only down side is the silicone itself did not allow the sand to easily fall off when using. I have both the 20 oz and the next larger size. I personally prefer the larger one, the spout is made better in my opinion. I would buy these again and highly recommend them. the only reason cleaning is only 4 stars is that bottles in general are not as easy to clean as a wider mouthed container.
customer_reviews.author: Nanabeau7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to refill on a two week trip to Italy, and they were perfect! We would refill them at night, freeze them, and they had refreshing cool water by mid-morning. If you're going to a place that has lots of water access (like Italy with tons of free public fountains), these are a great eco way to stay hydrated. They kept their shape, didn't scratch, didn't leak, and folded up nicely when we didn't need them filled.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: I planed a trip to Bora Bora, and after reading tons of reviews I noticed that previous travelers suggested taking with you a bottle of water to refill at the gym since they charge for the water in all resorts, I need to drink water constantly and in the same token, I didn't want to take anything bulky in my carry on luggage, well...This as PERFECT for that!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these water bottles specifically for my trip to Orlando to use when visiting all of the theme parks. We visited Orlando in July when it was very hot and humid. These water bottles are SO lightweight that I didn't even notice them attached to my backpack. I love the material that they are made out of too! They were perfect at Disney where I could fill them up at the water fountains throughout the park and stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: SWTHRT

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes weird.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient water bottle as it folds up when empty and does not take up much space. what I did not like was that after water sat in the bottle a few hours it began to taste funny, like it was absorbing flavor from the silicone bottle. Will not use it any more because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie W

customer_reviews.title: Defective product shipped..
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to try these on the cruise we are taking. Arrived today to find the pink top is completely busted off inside the bag. Very sad that it was shipped out this way to begin with. Started a return now to struggle and find a replacement with a short time frame due to no time to replace through mail before we leave.
customer_reviews.author: A. LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as well
customer_reviews.text: The concept was cool and I thought I would use it a lot more. The bottle did stand up as described, even without water in it. However, to drink from it was kind of difficult. I also had to be very careful with it in order for it not to leak nor break the hook while hanging off my backpack. Filling the water up without spilling was also something I had to learn. Also, I do NOT recommend putting anything other than water in the bottle as it was VERY hard to clean the inside. If you ask me, if it did the job... I will say yes, but I am not raving about it either.
customer_reviews.author: E S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to learn but good product once you do...
customer_reviews.text: I struggled learning how to even use these things. They are flimsy and take some getting used to which I knew before buying. I was able to wash them with a bottle cleaner, they didn't leak in my bag, and if I held them the right way I could easily drink from them. Human error results: they leaked when I turned them up to drink out of them and if I didn't hold is almost perfect it would spill all over the place. I would recommend these for people who need something cheap and flexible if they are willing to learn to use them the right way!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drinking bottle for kids school bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bottle for the intention for me to save valuable space in my bag, especially when I commute, i like things that make my commute easy to bear. Folding up the bottle when im done takes off the extra weight and space of a traditional glass or plastic bottle in my bag. With that being said , the bottle stands the endurance test when i have sent the bottle with my 8 year old to school. From previous hard drinking bottles we had. They would be banged, played with and would start leaking. We have gone through alot of bottles, i hope this will last.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Love this reusable water bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to clean...I wanted a good space saving travel water bottle - easy to fill and easy to clean. This is the perfect size for keeping water next to you while sleeping...that doesn't leak (as long as you remember to snap the top) and it's easy to drink from. It even keeps the water slightly cool. Must be on level table top though as it's really squishy and can fall over...but won't spill if closed.
customer_reviews.author: jjiral

customer_reviews.title: Too flimzy
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are very easy to fold and fold small, however they feel very flimzy. The silicone is thin and the bottle does not stand very well on its own, especially when there is less water in it. The mouth is small and harder to filll. It iis also hard to hold it when drinking, especially when less than full
customer_reviews.author: Rittberger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Promised
customer_reviews.text: I had to give these a test whirl on my latest trip. I loved how little space they took up when rolled up. It was so easy to get out when I was ready to fill it up in the airport. I also loved having it in the hotel room! Screwing the top on can be a little tricky because you can't hold the actual bottle or you'll squeeze it out. The only time I tasted something off (like the bottle) was when the water had been in there a long time. I would totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie S

customer_reviews.title: Great deal; space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for our trip to Disney World, to carry a water bottle to refill, but also not have something bulky to carry around. These did the trick beautifully!! Each night I filled them and froze them in the freezer and took them with us. If I were to make one suggestion, I wish the opening where you pour water in, was a bit bigger, so you can easily fit ice cubes. You can, but it's not a quick process. Otherwise, these are great and have held up well so far. Two for the price is a great deal, also!!
customer_reviews.author: Diann

customer_reviews.title: Super Reusable Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago, I purchased two of these water bottles to take on a trip to Europe with my niece. They worked out so well that I just purchased two more for an upcoming trip to Europe with friends, so we all will have reusable bottles. The bottle is lightweight and so easy to carry. When empty, it can be collapsed to take up less space in my bag. When filled with water, it fits into the bottle carrier on my backpack like any other water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are great little bottles. If you travel frequently, you get sick of buying a bottle of water every time you clear security. You get sick of hotel rooms that give you tiny cups to drink from. Having these bottles eliminates that. They take up very little room when collapsed, and you then have something to fill up when you need water. I've now purchased two pairs of these, and I gave away both of my first pair. People will absolutely ask you about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!!! Easy to clean, fun to poke, holes water and doesn’t tip over. Can not wait to take it on my next trip where I have to bring an empty water bottle to the airport. I’m a light carry on only traveler and one of the bulkiest items I have is the water bottle. This one is way better than those weird juice pouch shaped ones that I feel I can’t really get clean the seams on the inside. I rarely give wholehearted approval to things but this item is sturdy and well made and exactly as described so now I’m getting two more for the rest of my family.
customer_reviews.author: mspicky

customer_reviews.title: Handy Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for camping, particularly to lighten the load when bringing some wine. Although probably not tough enough to withstand scraping on rocks, the silicone walls seem durable when treated with respect. I leak-tested them, and was satisfied. I like that each bottle can be rolled up and secured by an attached silicone band. These are definitely worth the $16 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Selchie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We use them while hunting, easy to roll up and store once it's empty, plus I like that we don't have to buy bottled water, we just re use these, and they are so much more quiet than plastic bottles so we don't scare deer away! It took awhile for the smell and flavor to go away in these but now they're fine
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Weathermon

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE - DEFECTIVE BOTTLES LEAK IMMEDIATELY - DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY these as they LEAK. On day of delivery, I was leaving for 2 week trip so definitely wanted to use these water bottles. Had to throw the first one out by the time I reached the airport because it leaked water all over bag in the one hour drive to airport - ruining many other things. Filled the second after security check and through it away before boarding the plane about one hour later as it leaked too. TOTAL MALFUNCTIONING BOTTLES THAT ARE CHEAP AND NOT USABLE.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to dry the inside
customer_reviews.text: My product molded on the inside even though I had only used it to hold water, wahed it with dish soap, and it was stored without the top. Very disappointed. It was handy on our trip, but mold had grown on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective for what it's made for
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed opinions about these water bottles. It is awesome during airport security to collapse the water bottles. However, they might be a little too collapsable. It is tricky to get the water bottles to stay in the side pockets of backpacks; they fold over and/or fall out. I will not be using these for day-to-day activities, they will be effective for traveling and that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Battin

customer_reviews.title: Would have a grommet; leaks
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this as I travel through airports a lot. Very easy to pack and perfect for airport travel. HOWEVER, should have come with a grommet. Water leaking is bad enough, but much better than juice or something like a drink mix that will stain your clothes. Bottom line: beware of leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is well made, does not leak and is easy to clean. Although, I find it a little hard to hold when the bottle isn't full. If you hold it in the middle it droops at the bottom. When you fill it and open it up to drink it over flows, sort of like those really thin prefilled bottles of water. I purchased these for travel through airports and on the plane, so we'll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these bottles. They proved to be perfect for my travel needs. I was able to keep them folded and out of the way until needed. Once I got pass airport security, I fill them with water and they provided extra water on a 21 hours flight. When I was finished I just refolded and they took up very little space. They also served me well on my day tours. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: William Slofer

customer_reviews.title: These bottles are great! Very useful on our trip to Europe!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of walking in the hot sun in Italy and Spain and I was so thankful I had these bottles with us. I was filling them with fresh water every chance I could. In Europe they have a public fountains that everyone would be drinking from. These bottles came in handy for sure. They fold up so nice when they are empty too, allowing you to have room in your back pack for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Mold grows in it.
customer_reviews.text: We discovered multiple spots of mold inside the bottles after few days. Sterilization with bleach did not solve the problem. Mold keeps forming. The plastic hinge broke too. I can get it clean only with a brush. Not very comfortable to drink out off nether hold it while it is less than half full.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Semm

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles. They are super light weight, fold into a small roll and can easily fit into a small purse. You can run them through the dishwasher to clean, ew say to drink from. The only negative is the plastics taste. I’ve started using flavored enchanted and it has fixed the issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Can't tolerate the rubbery smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking I would use them for travel since they are easy to pack, but unfortunately, the rubbery smell just doesn't go away and the water doesn't taste very good like that, so I've sort of abandoned the idea. I've even tried storing them with the lids off, and it doesn't seem to help much. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper007

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to hold but still worth having
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip through Europe. We knew it would be hot and we'd need to be packing water. They collapse very small and seal perfectly. Functionally they were fine. To be honest using them was awkward though because they are so soft and floppy. I probably will not use them again. Maybe I'll throw them in my car for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Pluses &minuses
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient when tight on space. They are a little awkward to drink from (if you squeeze the silicone at all when not drinking, water comes out). Also, unless completely full of water, they don't stand up on a table. With all that in mind....I would purchase again for the tight packing space benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, Sweats, and won't Stand
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is extremely flismy. The rubber attracts dirt and hair easily so it always feels gritty. It's difficult to drink from without squirting yourself in the face because it's so flimsy. What do you expect from a bottle that can be rolled up though. Not sure that's such a great benefit. Sweats badly even in room temperature. Does not stand upright unless it is full. One star is for the hook and because a portion of sales went to dolphin rescue. I wanted to return, but it I went passed the deadline a few days in my request. Read my concerns carefully and rethink the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kat1213

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel and activity water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight collapsible water bottle for travel and other on-the-go activities and this one fits the bill. Very lightweight and compact for taking through TSA and no funny plastic taste that some others have. I love that this company is donating a portion of their proceeds to dolphin protection and rescue. Who doesn't love dolphins?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Penny

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell/taste.
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are cute and pack nicely, but they do have a very strong chemical smell/taste. I took the bottles on a trip, but the taste was unbearable. I did wash the bottles several times prior to use and they still kept the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Very useful all around
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bottle as for my personal use, i travel a lot and goes to airport to airport where water is not allowed to be brought in and buying water at the airport cost a fortune. The bottle was so amazing, easy to fold, does not take any weight on my baggage and is so flexible nor easy to put any hole. I love it and im giving it away to my family and friends this Christmas for they all want one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bottles when I bought them but it was highly recommended by my nephew who carries a bottle of water ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these silicone bottles when I bought them but it was highly recommended by my nephew who carries a bottle of water wherever he goes. I used it the first time today and I loved it! The bottle stands straight up when it's filled with water. It is not flimsy as I thought it would. It's very easy to squeeze water out of it so that I don't have to get my lipstick all over the cap. I wish they had more colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy when holding & drinking from
customer_reviews.text: Although the bottles look great and love that part of sales is going towards saving dolphins, I found them too flimsy whenever picking up to drink from. They do stand up straight but the flimsiness I’m not fond of at all. I’d like to hold on to something solid and not something that sort of collapses in on itself and feels way too pliable. Therefore I gave them to the donation station.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: These bottles are great. I ran them through the dishwasher on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great. I ran them through the dishwasher on the top shelf. They do take a little getting used to as you can't squeeze them when drinking. The seller was great! Items received quickly and when I contacted the seller about what I thought was an error, they were quick to respond. It was my mistake in thinking I had ordered something else. Great item and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: nice but kind of wobbly to drink out of
customer_reviews.text: this is nice for travel since it folds up and takes up very little room. The only negativee I found was it takes some getting used to to drink out of since it is so soft, I finally figured out to hold it by the rim. Nice bottle though and good price
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible silicone water bottles.
customer_reviews.text: They proved to be perfect for my travel needs. I am able to keep them folded and out of the way until needed. Once through airport security, I fill them with water and they provide water for a long flight. When empty I just refold and they take up very little space. They also serve well on day tours. I highly recommend these. They do not have a smell to them. The top is wide enough to allow ice cubes. They do not leak and have a clip to hang from bags etc
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Expected only one but comes in a two pack! Perfect for the pup's backpack and for my backpack! Light weight, durable and fits well in my hand. Seems like it may fall over when half full or less but totally doesn't. The story behind the company name is heart warming and the fact they're apart of the whole makes me feel good about my purchase. I 100% recommend these :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle folds up nice and tight and has a strap to keep it rolled up. It seems a little flimsy when full of water, although it does hold 20 ounces. The clip to hold it to your backpack is made of plastic, so I'm not sure how that will hold up. There were no holes in the bottles, and delivery was quick. Will look into other travel bottles for sturdiness before deciding to keep these. If flimsy doesn't matter to you, they are are good price both the set. Delivery was quick, and the company seems to be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Too soft and floppy for sports or hiking
customer_reviews.text: This waterbottle was advertised as good for hiking, sports and such. I would say it’s not good for any of them. It does not stand up on its own very well, even fully filled with water. It does not stay well in a water bottle sleeve of a backpack, as the silicone is so soft the water bottle flops around like a fish. You cannot hold it while running or doing sports, as it is very very soft and squeezes out of your hands. The only good is that yes, since it is so soft it is easily compressible. But that is the only benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Roaming

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and light!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are light, very easy to clean, to store and to carry around. They are completely leak proof as described. The only reason for four stars is that once filled with liquid and you try to drink, ironically, it collapses too easy for me. Once you control the flow, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles go everywhere!! Took them snorkeling and. Lipped then to life vest! They floated and never let any salt water in. It was great to have fresh water while in the ocean and to wash the kids mouths out when they choked on salt water or got sand in their faces on the beach
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes funny
customer_reviews.text: They're a little awkward to drink from since they're so floppy but you get used to it. I like that they're leakproof and super lightweight. What I don't like is that they make the water taste funny, even when you clean them thoroughly and use fresh filtered water. They served their purpose on our trip to Europe but I'm not sure I would use them at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you can make it work for you
customer_reviews.text: I love these water bottles! Especially on trips where I have to carry a lot of things. They are easy to fold up. Easy to clean. My only complaint is that they cause my to take a Lot of air in when I drink from them and that hurts My stomach. So I have to pour it into my mouth, but that’s a risk because the bottle is so flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these for a vacation we had planned. Overall they held up pretty well. My husband did have a slight issue where he almost lost his but that was because the carabiner detached from the water bottle. I had read this in another review so we thankfully had an extra carabiner packed with us. Aside from this, the water bottles were relatively easy to use, fold, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t squish the bottle or you’ll wear your drink
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike that everything here was wrapped in plastic. The very thing we’re trying to avoid and yup three plastic bags come with these two bottles. It’s hard to drink from a squishy bottle unless you hold the lid part. Doesn’t leak per se but there is some serious spillage from the attempts to drink.
customer_reviews.author: MPMD

customer_reviews.title: Strange odor and leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these bottles and that purchasing them helps support dolphin rescue. I recently took one of them on a trip to Jerusalem and was very disappointed. Even though I washed the bottle according to directions, a strange odor persisted which made the water taste less than refreshing. Also, after a few days use, the bottle leaked from around the plastic top. I ended up having to buy plastic bottles of water which I was trying to avoid in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling lite.
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our Disney world trip in Florida. We wanted something that took up less space in our backpacks. We loved that if they were empty we could just roll them up and stash them in a side pocket. The kids drank from them easily. Easy to refill at water fountains. Only issue is that they do make a lot of condensation if it’s ice cold water. But we didn’t mind because they were in outside pockets, not inside out backpacks. Just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but water has a taste after a while
customer_reviews.text: I went to Europe and used this water bottle, so it had much use. I liked how easy it was to carry around and put away. Once you got used to holding the bottle a certain way, it didn't spill (make sure you hold it by the top hard plastic top). My only qualm was after a while, the water that was put in there started having a weird taste. I could chalk it up to water from another country, but it still happened when I got back home. So, do be aware that there is a strange, plastic taste after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with these water bottles. We needed them for a trip we were taking to Ireland. I didn’t want to use disposable water bottles and needed something that wouldn’t take up any space in my luggage. I didn’t give 5 stars for the ease of drinking only because it does take some getting use to, because they are not a firm bottle, but the fact that they are perfect for hiking, traveling, and easy to clean, makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Way too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I never bothered to send them back... I gave them to some of my co-workers. When you fill them with water they are as flimsy as a water balloon. When I went to return them the first time they sent me MORE of them.... I just said forget it and gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: David Reed Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for travel but careful when drinking!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using my silicone water bottles but so far I like them. They are easy to compress/compact and add to my purse/bag. I will probably rig up some sort of removable holder to wrap around when it has water. I tried to take a drink without looking and ended up spilling all over myself. I'm trying to reduce my plastic use but I'm also not fond of carrying glass containers around in my purse as they are heavy! This is a good compromise for now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

product_meta.title: baiji bottle ll120 Silicone Water Bottles Sports Camping Canteen 20 Oz. -Easy To Clean And Store, Blue & Pink
product_meta.description: Color:Blue & PinkThe baiji bottle silicone water bottle (set of 2) fun, functional, convenient, unique (and each purchase makes a difference) 2-pack of silicone water bottles by baiji bottle. - Each food grade silicone bottle is individually packed- two bottles, one red and one blue, are packed into a 2 bottle set and shipped directly from amazon to you.- Soft supple silicone is strong and stain, odor, and taste resistant- great gift for anyone who drinks water- since each bottle is individually wrapped, they can easily be used or given out in single units more benefits - foldable and rollable: Designed to stand upright when full and can be folded, rolled up, or laid flat when empty.- Carabiner: The included carabiner can be used to clip bottle to gear or to hold the bottle for storage.- Retainer strap: The retainer strap is made of the same silicone and can be used to hold the bottle in rolled position.- Washable: Dishwasher safe on the top dishwasher rack. Easy to wash by hand as well.- Freezing: Fill 1/2 to 2/3 full and stand upright in freezer. Once frozen, top off and enjoy a cool drink for hours- sharing: Baiji bottles are unique and fun to share. Why baiji? Our bottles are named to commemorate the baiji dolphin which was declared "functionally extinct" in 2007. While the baiji is gone, there are many dolphin species in need of help. So we have committed to donate 10% of all baiji bottle profits to dolphin rescue and protection programs.Current pricing is an introductory offer for amazon buyers, click the yellow "add to cart" button now to lock in the lowest possible price.
feature_bullets: Food Grade Silicone (Stain, Oder, and Taste Resistant)
Rollable and Foldable with metal carabiner and retainer band for clip-on and storage
Freezable - keeps drink cold for hours
Each Bottle is individually packed in clear poly bag, shipped in set of two bottles
A portion of all profits donated to dolphin rescue and protection organizations (verifiable).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,754 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
